name: James ANDERSON, Petitioner v. Lynne A. ABRAHAM, District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Penna., Respondent

parties: James ANDERSON, Petitioner v. Lynne A. ABRAHAM, District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Penna., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of June, 2008, Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Motion to Seek Leave of the Court to Supplement the Record are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
951 A.2d 257
James ANDERSON, Petitioner v. Lynne A. ABRAHAM, District Attorney of Philadelphia County, Penna., Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 11, 2008.
